channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Widget for Social Page Feeds
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Widget for Social Page Feeds

item.title: CVE-2024-0973|2024-03-18T19:05:46.858Z -- Unknown -- Widget for Social Page Feeds
item.description: The Widget for Social Page Feeds WordPress plugin before 6.4 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
